mapper.select: SELECT U.UPLOAD_NO, U.TITLE, U.CONTENT, U.CREATE_DATE, U.MODIFY_DATE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ATTACH A WHERE U.UPLOAD_NO = A.UPLOAD_NO) AS ATTACH_CNT FROM UPLOAD U
mapper.insert:
SELECT UPLOAD_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO UPLOAD (UPLOAD_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE) VALUES (#{uploadNo}, #{title}, #{content}, SYSTIMESTAMP, SYSTIMESTAMP)
INSERT INTO ATTACH (ATTACH_NO, PATH, ORIGIN, FILESYSTEM, DOWNLOAD_CNT, HAS_THUMBNAIL, UPLOAD_NO) VALUES (ATTACH_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{path}, #{origin}, #{filesystem}, 0, #{hasThumbnail}, #{uploadNo})
mapper.select: SELECT ATTACH_NO, PATH, ORIGIN, FILESYSTEM, DOWNLOAD_CNT, HAS_THUMBNAIL, UPLOAD_NO FROM ATTACH WHERE PATH = CONCAT('storage\\', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'yyyy\\mm\\dd'))
